text: my food tube channel is split into three categories so its really easy for you
guys to find your way around Jamie's food world is where i'm going to gather everything
and everyone who is important to me in one place its got chefs who have trained me like
my mentor Genarro Contaldo and there's not much about cooking that he doesn't know and
chefs also that i have trained like Aaron Craze and cerriane dunmow who have all
got different skills and cooking wonderful cooks and great communicators  as

photographer extraordinaire and you can see my incredible trusted food team
